short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Watch the plays that helped propel your team to the top!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get up-to-date highlight videos of all the players on your Yahoo! fantasy baseball team. Highlight types include hitting and pitching by default, with the possiblity of adding defense and/or interviews if desired.
